keywords: TfL,Bus fares, hopper fare, tram fare, bus price, tram price
description: Fares for travel on buses and trams in London

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Prices for pay as you go, Travelcards and Bus \u0026 Tram Passes."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"How much does it cost?"}
Your fare is different depending on your age or need.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"5-10"}
All 5-10 year old's travel for free on buses and trams and don't need an Oyster photocard.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"11-15"}
You can travel free on buses and trams with an 11-15 Zip Oyster photocard .
If you have a non-concessionary 11-15 Oyster photocard, you pay an adult fare.

{"template":"table","titles":["Pay as you go","Daily cap","7 Day Bus \u0026 Tram Pass","Monthly Bus \u0026 Tram Pass","Annual Bus \u0026 Tram Pass"],"rows":[[],["£0.75","£2.25","£10.60","£40.80","£424"]]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"16+"}
You can travel with a 16+ Zip Oyster photocard and get 50% off an adult Bus & Tram Pass .

{"template":"table","titles":["Pay as you go","Daily cap","7 Day Bus \u0026 Tram Pass","Monthly Bus \u0026 Tram Pass","Annual Bus \u0026 Tram Pass"],"rows":[[],["£1.50","£4.50","£14.80","£56.90","£592"]]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"18 + Student"}
You can travel with an 18+ Student Oyster photocard and get 30% off 7 Day, Monthly and longer period Bus & Tram Passes .

{"template":"table","titles":["Pay as you go","Daily cap","7 Day Bus \u0026 Tram Pass","Monthly Bus \u0026 Tram Pass","Annual Bus \u0026 Tram Pass"],"rows":[[],["£1.50","£4.50","£14.80","£56.90","£592"]]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Apprentice"}
You can travel with an Apprentice Oyster photocard and get 30% off 7 Day, Monthly and longer period Bus & Tram Passes .

{"template":"table","titles":["br","Pay as you go","Daily cap","7 Day Bus \u0026 Tram Pass","Monthly Bus \u0026 Tram Pass","Annual Bus \u0026 Tram Pass"],"rows":[[],["\u003cbr /\u003e","£1.50","£4.50","£14.80","£56.90","£592"]]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Adult"}
You can travel using pay as you go with:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Your \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go/contactless-and-mobile-pay-as-you-go\"\u003econtactless card\u003c/a\u003e (daily and weekly, Monday to Sunday capping)","Your \u003ca href=\"/fares/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go/oyster-pay-as-you-go\"\u003eOyster card\u003c/a\u003e (daily and weekly, Monday to Sunday capping)"]}
{"template":"table","titles":["Single cap","Daily cap","Weekly cap"],"rows":[[],["£1.50","£4.50","£21.20"]]}
You can also travel using your Oyster card with a 7 Day, Monthly and Annual Bus & Tram Pass .
{"template":"table","titles":["One Day Bus \u0026 Tram Pass","7 Day Bus \u0026 Tram Pass","Monthly Bus \u0026 Tram Pass","Annual Bus \u0026 Tram Pass"],"rows":[[],["£5.00","£21.20","£81.50","£848"]]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Jobcentre Plus"}
You can travel with a Jobcentre Plus Travel Discount .

{"template":"table","titles":["Pay as you go","Daily cap","7 Day Bus \u0026 Tram Pass","Monthly Bus \u0026 Tram Pass","Annual Bus \u0026 Tram Pass"],"rows":[[],["£0.75","£2.25","£10.60","£40.80","Not available"]]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Bus \u0026 Tram Discount"}
You can travel with a Bus & Tram Discount photocard .

{"template":"table","titles":["Pay as you go","Daily cap","7 Day Bus \u0026 Tram Pass","Monthly Bus \u0026 Tram Pass","Annual Bus \u0026 Tram Pass"],"rows":[[],["£0.75","£2.25","£10.60","£40.80","Not available"]]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Hopper fare"}
You can make unlimited bus and tram journeys, within one hour, for £1.50 with our Hopper fare .
The fare is for adult and discounted rate pay as you go journeys.

If your Oyster card has no credit or a negative balance after your first journey, the Hopper fare won't apply. You'll need to top up your card within one hour of touching in to be eligible for the Hopper fare.
